Uses of Package
org.genson.reflect

Packages that use org.genson.reflect
org.genson This package contains Genson base classes, to start with have a look at Genson. 
org.genson.convert This package provides some default Converter implementations and the chained factory and converter decorator mechanisms. 
org.genson.reflect This package contains the core api providing databinding support for complex objects. 
 

Classes in org.genson.reflect used by org.genson
BeanDescriptorProvider
          Interface implemented by classes who want to provide BeanDescriptor instances for the specified type.
BeanMutatorAccessorResolver
          BeanMutatorAccessorResolver interface must be implemented by class who want to resolve mutators (fields or methods that allow you to modify a property), accessors (fields or methods that allow you to retrieve the value of a property) and creators (constructors or static methods that allow you to create objects).
BeanViewDescriptorProvider
          This class constructs BeanDescriptor for the BeanView mechanism.
PropertyNameResolver
          This interface is intended to be implemented by classes who want to change the way genson does name resolution.
VisibilityFilter
          This class is used as filter for properties discovery.
 

Classes in org.genson.reflect used by org.genson.convert
BeanDescriptorProvider
          Interface implemented by classes who want to provide BeanDescriptor instances for the specified type.
BeanViewDescriptorProvider
          This class constructs BeanDescriptor for the BeanView mechanism.
 

Classes in org.genson.reflect used by org.genson.reflect
AbstractBeanDescriptorProvider
          Abstract implementation of BeanDescriptorProvider applying the template pattern.
BaseBeanDescriptorProvider
          Standard implementation of AbstractBeanDescriptorProvider that uses BeanMutatorAccessorResolver and PropertyNameResolver.

BeanCreator.BeanCreatorProperty
           
BeanDescriptor

          Interface implemented by classes who want to provide BeanDescriptor instances for the specified type.
BeanMutatorAccessorResolver
          BeanMutatorAccessorResolver interface must be implemented by class who want to resolve mutators (fields or methods that allow you to modify a property), accessors (fields or methods that allow you to retrieve the value of a property) and creators (constructors or static methods that allow you to create objects).
BeanProperty
           
PropertyAccessor

          This interface is intended to be implemented by classes who want to change the way genson does name resolution.
